patient

Class PatientFileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • patient.PatientFileManager

  • public class PatientFileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used to manage and interact with patient files.

      • checkIn

        public void checkIn(PatientFile patientFile)
        This method will check a patient in into the system.
        Parameters:
        patientFile - The patientfile of the patient who needs to be checked in.

      • checkOut

        public void checkOut(PatientFile patientFile)
        This method will checkout and discharge a patient.
        Parameters:
        patientFile - The patientfile of the patient who is checking out.

      • registerPatient

        public PatientFile registerPatient(java.lang.String name)
        This method registers a new patient in the hospital database.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new patient.
        Returns:
        The patientfile for the new patient.

      • getAllPatientFiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<PatientFile> getAllPatientFiles()
        Returns:
        All the patientfiles this patientfilemanager manages.

      • containsFileOf

        public boolean containsFileOf(PatientFile patientFile)
        This method checks if the patientfile of a certain patient exists.
        Parameters:
        patientFile - the patientfile to check for existence.
        Returns:
        True if the file exists in this patient file manager.

      • getPatientFilesAsString

        public java.lang.String getPatientFilesAsString()
        Returns:
        A list of all patients (as String)

      • getPatientFileSize

        public int getPatientFileSize()
        Returns:
        The amount of patientfiles this patientfilemanager manages.

      • getAllResultsFrom

        public java.util.Collection<Result> getAllResultsFrom(PatientFile patientFile)
        This function can be used to get the testresult of a certain patient.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the patient.
        Returns:
        A collection of all the testresults of this patient.

      • getPatientFileFrom

        public PatientFile getPatientFileFrom(java.lang.String name)
        This method will fetch the patientfile from a certain patient.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the patient.
        Returns:
        The patientfile of the requested patient or null if no such patient is found.
